title: Micromax 101 cm (40 inch) Full HD LED Smart TV  (40 CANVAS-S)

product_specification.In The Box:
Wall Mount Support
User Manual
Television Unit
Base Stand
Remote Controller
Battery (For Remote Control)
Quick Installation Guide
product_specification.Panel Type: A+ Grade, 100% Zero Bright Dot Panel
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MPEG – 1 / 2 / 4, H.263 / H.264, MPG, MOV, MKV, MP4
product_specification.Other Video Features: Picture Mode: Normal, Vivid, Mild, User
product_specification.Processor: MSD 628 Quad Core A7 Cortex (1 GHz)
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Quick Boot, Media, Frequently Visited Apps, Home Share, Miracast, Wi-Fi Type: 802.11 b / g / n (1T1R)
product_specification.Covered in Warranty:
Sub PCBs
Power Supply
Panel
Main PCB
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty:
Aesthetic/Plastic parts such as Remote Control
Cabinets Stand
Accessories such as Cables (HDMI, AV, DVI, etc.)
product_specification.Warranty Service Type:
To avail 2 Years Extended Warranty Offer-Extended Warranty Registration is mandatory within 30 days of Purchase date only, after 30 days EW can't be registered EW Registration can be done:
1. By Calling at our Customer Care (Toll Free) Number : 1800 102 3999 - First Priority.
2. By login at : MiService.micromaxinfo.com (Can be loin in explorer - Mobile (Android/Windows/Apple), Laptop and PC).
3. By sending SMS - at - 92122 30707 - SMS text is - EW Also Customer can raise query and log Call for Installation By Downloading Micromax Mobile APP : "Micromax Home Assit" (Picture attached) on Android Mobile phones.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered Under Standard Installation - Table Mounting Using Standard Stand Supplied as Accessory with TV - Extra Charges are Applicable for Wall Mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32 inch Display Size and Rs. 499 for >32 inch Display Size - Connecting with Available Power Source (within 1 Meter) - Connecting / Setting Up Various Available Input Source for Audio Video Based on Model - Connecting with Available WiFi (for Smart TV) - Checking TV for Proper Functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its Features

product_description.Resolution: With vivid colors, excellent contrast, and life-like details, the 102 cm display of this Micromax LED TV makes your viewing experience picture perfect.

A:A smart TV comes with built-in Internet connectivity, to access a range of online services including video on demand, social networking and may have fully featured web browser to access websites.

A:3D is an added feature in many high-end TVs. You can watch videos that are made in 3D with your 3D glasses, depending on the type of screen (Active or Passive). Do check our buying guide for details!
A:HDMI ports are required to connect cable box or Blu-ray player or a video game console or a streaming gadget, or a smartphone/tablet. You can decide the number of inputs required as per your usage.
A:The refresh rate is the number of frames the television can display per second. The standard rate is 60 60 Hz. Higher the rate, smoother the movements in videos- best for fast-moving sports/gaming.

A:4K, aka Ultra HD, comes with a 3840x2160 pixels resolution- (4x of full HD TV). The extra resolution adds better definition & depth to the pictures, resulting in images that look incredibly life-like
